title: Battle Master
content:
they have a Hit Dice of 1d10. They have proficiency with Simple weapons, Martial Weapons, Light Armour, Medium Armour, Heavy Armour and Shields.

Battle Masters are paragons of tactical superiority, combining combat Manoeuvres and experience in the field to dominate every fight.

Battle Master Manoeuvers
